meta.title: Pre-K-2nd - Tupelo Public School District

body.class: fsLiveMode fsHasHeader fsHasLeftBanner fsHasMenu fsHasFooter fsHasOneColumnLayout fsSection1634 fsHasTheme2 district

li.a: Get in Contact with My Child's Teacher
View the Tupelo High School Calendar

div.div:
The Tupelo Public School District serves the community by engaging each student in an
excellent education that develops skills and citizenship needed for success in a global society.
